title: Login issue
description: Customer reported issue with login. The system rejects valid credentials and keeps redirecting back to the login page.

title: Payment failed
description: Payment gateway is not processing requests. Multiple attempts result in transaction errors and users cannot complete purchases.

title: Error 404 on dashboard
description: Dashboard page shows 404 error. Users cannot access their statistics or reports after logging in.

title: App crashing on start
description: App crashes immediately on launch. The splash screen loads but then the app closes without any error message.

title: Slow website loading
description: Website takes too long to load. Average response time is over 12 seconds, causing poor user experience.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requested dark mode feature. They want the option to switch themes for better readability at night.

title: Email not received
description: Verification email not received. Users cannot activate their accounts or reset their passwords.

title: Bug in profile update
description: Profile update leads to unexpected error. Users lose their entered details after submitting the form.

title: Invoice not generated
description: Invoice is missing after purchase. Customers are unable to download or receive invoices via email.

title: Notification not working
description: No notifications are shown on app. Users are missing important updates about new messages and alerts.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search query returns empty results. Even valid keywords fail to fetch any data from the system.

title: Database connection error
description: Database connection timeout error. Application cannot fetch records and certain pages remain blank.
